content: The tutorial notes on Symfony are ready. See you this Thursday!

If you encounter WebSocket connection problems in OpenShift, it means that you did not specify the full URL in your client page (and this is my fault...I forget to include it in the slides). Please follow the instructions here to modify the JavaScript code of your HTML page.
Two set of slides in Week #9 are updated accordingly:
  • "WebSocket and Socket.IO": Updated pp. 7, 8; added p. 14.
  • "Deploying Node.js Applications on OpenShift": Added p. 15.
The example code is also updated. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.
Updated materials for our final tutorial on Assignment 2 :)
Uploaded tutorial video recording for Week #9.
Updated schedule, updated tutorial notes for Week #9: "Deploying Node.js Applications on OpenShift" and uploaded new tutorial notes for Week #10: "Remote debugging on Android or iOS devices".
I made a mistake on the slides: "Learning the basics of Node.js", page 17. Please download the slides again.
The recording of Assignment 2 Demonstration in today's tutorial are uploaded.

Updated tutorial notes for Week #7-9 (and hopefully they are finalized). Most of the modifications are to fix typos or unclear statements. For those pages involving key changes, they are indicated on the top right hand corner. Anyway, please download all the slides again.
Updated tutorial notes and example code for Week #9.
Updated pseudocode on tutorial notes for Week #7: "YouTube IFrame Player API".
Uploaded tutorial notes for Week #8: "Learning the Basics of Node.js" and Week #9: "WebSocket and Socket.IO"
Uploaded tutorial notes for Week #8: "Assignment 2 Overview (Server Side)" & Week #9: "Deploying Node.js Applications on OpenShift".
Fixed typo in "Installing Node.js and Express on Linux or Mac" (Week #6).
